summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TaskHub daily tracker application. All core features are working correctly including user authentication, task management, calendar views, analytics, and theme switching. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate.
passed_tests: User Registration - Successfully creates account and navigates to dashboard
User Login - JWT authentication working correctly
Task Creation - Can create tasks with all fields (title, description, due date, priority, category)
Task List View - Tasks display properly with correct formatting and colors
Task Status Toggle - Can mark tasks as completed/pending
Task Editing - Can update task details successfully
Search Functionality - Can search tasks by title/description
Filter by Category - Category filtering works correctly
Calendar View - Monthly grid view displays tasks on correct dates
Calendar Navigation - Previous/next month navigation working
Weekly View - Weekly list view shows tasks properly organized by day
Weekly Navigation - Previous/next week navigation working
Analytics Dashboard - Shows correct stats (total, completed, pending, completion rate)
Analytics Charts - Bar charts and pie charts render correctly with data
Analytics Trends - Weekly trends chart displays properly
Theme Toggle - Light/dark mode switching works perfectly
Sidebar Navigation - All navigation links work correctly
Backend API Authentication - Registration, login, and JWT validation working
Backend Task CRUD - Create, read, update, delete operations working
Backend Search & Filters - All query parameters working correctly
Backend Analytics - Summary and trends endpoints returning correct data

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (20/21 tests passed - minor filter dropdown issue)
